summary: A college freshman's world is rocked when she learns she is the adopted survivor of a failed abortion.
cast: Rachel Hendrix|Jason Burkey|John Schneider|Jennifer Price|Colleen Trusler|James Austin Johnson|Amisho Lewis|Mary Tolley|Corey Winston|Lance E. Nichols|Rhett Hendrix|Chris Sligh|Joy Brunson|Diego Montiel|Robert Amaya|Walter K. Jordan|Tracy Miller|Maria Atchison|Jasmine Guy|Shari Rigby|Tom Clark|Rodney Clark|Tawny Stephens|Lily Raffield|Brian Gall|Don Sandley|John Walden|Andrew Erwin|Jon Erwin|Carl Conway Maguire|Debrika Wright Person|Chuck Waldrop
title: October Baby
